contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} In the mythology of [[Kiribati]], '''Auriaria''' is a red-skinned giant chieftain who fell in love with the beautiful red-skinned woman, [[Nei Tituaabine]], but had no children. She died and, from her grave grew three treesâ€”a [[coconut]] from her [[head (anatomy)|head]], a [[pandanus]] from her [[heel]]s and an [[almond]] from her [[navel]]. She became a [[tree]] goddess. [[Category:Kiribati mythology]] {{Oceania-myth-stub}} {{Kiribati-stub}}
